direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate the class attribute of elements, but in opposite ways.
Both methods involve modifying the class attribute, though toggleClass adds or removes based on presence.
Both methods involve setting attributes on elements, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods modify element attributes, though removeAttr specifically removes an attribute.
Both methods involve selecting elements based on criteria, though select is more general.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of elements is required before adding classes.
Environment setup is often required before manipulating elements.
Verification of class attribute changes is crucial for testing the addClass method.
